text: == Events == * September 7 — Geoffrey of Anjou dies, and is replaced by his son Henry who is 18 years old. * The first plague and fire insurance policy is issued in Iceland == Births == * April 3 — Igor Svyatoslavich, Russian prince (d. 1202) * Unkei, Japanese sculptor (d. 1223) == Deaths == * January 13 — Abbot Suger, French statesman and historian (b. c. 1081) * April 23 — Adeliza of Leuven, queen of Henry I of England (b. 1103) * September 7 — Geoffrey V, Count of Anjou (b. 1113)
